bibl.title: Jineśvarasūri’s Gāhārayaṇakosa
bibl.note: Digital copy available via Internet Archive.

lg.l: laṅkā layā palāsā vasantamāsammi laddhamāhappā
nivvāhiūṇa sīyaṁ pacchā kaliyārayā jāyā
kaliyāmisēṇa ubbhēvi aṅgulī mālaīē mahamahiyaṁ
vārēu jā samatthā maha intaṁ mahuyarajuvāṇaṁ
pavaṇuddhuyapallavakarayalēhi vārēi māhavī bhasalaṁ
pupphavaïmalliyāsaṅgadūsiō mā mamaṁ chivasu
mālaïkaliyā mayarandamandirā mandamandaviyasantī
kusalēṇa chappaēṇa va taha ramiyā jaha na uttasaï
garuyattaṇassa kō māmi! maruyaō ettiyaṁ puṇa bhaṇāmi
pāē dhuvanti nissēsataruyarā parimalakahāē
lacchīkarakamalaviyāsarēṇupūrijjamāṇanayaṇēhiṁ
pāsaṭṭhiyā vi dīsanti nēya rōrā dhaṇaḍḍhēhiṁ
sūrāyavapapphuṭṭantakaṇayakandoṭṭarēṇupiṅgaṅgā
daṁsaṇamittēṇaṁ ciya māṇasahaṁsā kalijjanti
nūṇaṁ-rakhalakālakūḍavisasaṅgakalusiyā lacchī
maülanti jēṇa nayaṇāiṁ takkhaṇaṁ tīē jē diṭṭhā
sui-diṭṭhivāyaharaṇē narāṇa lacchīē kō visaṁvāō?
jaṁ na kuṇaï garalasahōyarā vi maraṇaṁ tamacchariyaṁ
pecchantā vi na pecchanti, jāṇamāṇā vi nēya jāṇanti
nisuṇantā vi hu nisuṇanti nēya rajjaṁ samāsajja
aṇahuntā vi hu huntīē hunti, huntā vi janti jantīē
ō! jīē samaṁ nīsēsaguṇagaṇā jayaü sā lacchī
avaṇijjaï hārō kāmiṇīhiṁ thaṇamaṇḍalāō raïsamaē
avasararahiyā guṇavantayā vi dūrē ṭhavijjanti
dūra cciya pammukkā tujjhamha phalāsā palāsa! saüṇēhiṁ
kusumoggamammi taïyā jaṁ kira kasaṇīkayaṁ vayaṇaṁ
andhāriūṇa vayaṇaṁ virasaṁ rasiūṇa māmi! khatthēhi
taha jalaharēhiṁ dinnaṁ paüraṁ pi jalaṁ alaṁ tēhiṁ
mahiuṁ mahōahiṁ mahumahō vi jaṁ suyaï tassa ucchaṅgē
taṁ ciya nīivirūddhaṁ, ahavā chajjaï samatthāṇa
tā nigguṇa cciya varaṁ payaṇuyalambhēṇa jāṇa pariōsō
guṇiṇō guṇāṇurūvaṁ phalamalahantā kilammanti
abbhatthiō vi sayavattavaṇasirī haraï jaṁ nisānāhō
taṁ tassa nēya juttaṁ, ahavā kā lajja sakalaṅkē?
hōhī balī surindō tuṭṭhēṇa murāriṇā na sandēhō
baddhō pāyālagaō ēsō saddō na phiṭṭēhī
nivvaḍiyapurisayārē asaccasambhāvaṇā vi sambhavaï
ekkāṇaṇē vi sīhē jāyā pañcāṇaṇapasiddhī
taṁ saddaṁ taṁ dhavalattaṇaṁ ca taṁ cēva mahuyahījammaṁ
saṅkhassa hiyayakuḍilattaṇēṇa sayalaṁ samupphusiyaṁ
hārō urassa, savaṇāṇa kuṇḍalē, mēhalā niyambassa
nayaṇāṇa puṇō garuē vi ūsavē kajjalasalāyā
jō jattiyassa atthassa bhāyaṇaṁ sō u tettiyaṁ lahaï
vuṭṭhē vi dōṇamēhē na ḍuṅgarē pāṇiyaṁ ṭhāi
uvabhuñjiuṁ na sakkaï riddhiṁ pattō vi punnaparihīṇō
paüraṁ pi jalaṁ tisiō vi maṇḍalō lihaï jīhāē
accāsannē parigalaï gāravaṁ suhaya! tujjha kō dōsō?
niyaacchī vi na pecchaï paḍilaggā kajjalasalāyā
ṭhāṇēsu guṇā payaḍā, ṭhāṇāṇi guṇēhiṁ pāyaḍijjati
sōhaï nayaṇēhiṁ masī, masīē sōhanti nayaṇāiṁ
varataruṇinayaṇaparisaṇṭhiyassa jaṁ kajjalassa māhappaṁ
dīvayasihāēṇa tahā, ṭhāṇēsu guṇā visaṭṭati
varataruṇisihiṇaparisaṇṭhiyassa hārassa hōi jā sōhā
sippīpuḍammi na tahā, ṭhāṇēsu guṇā visaṭṭanti
vaṁsacchēē vi kaē na muyaï māyaṅgasaṅgahaṁ viñjhō
niyakittilañchaṇāō garuyā pālēnti paḍivannaṁ
chijjaü sīsaṁ, aha hōu vandhaṇaṁ, cayaü savvahā lacchī
paḍivannapālaṇē supurisāṇa jaṁ hōi taṁ hōu
ujjhanti dhaṇaṁ, chaḍḍanti maṇḍalaṁ, pariharanti niyajīyaṁ
kuvvanti nēya kahavi hu païṇṇahāṇī mahāpurisā
acchaü tāva'nnajaṇō aṅge cciya jāiṁ pañca bhūyāiṁ
tāṇaṁ ciya lajjijjaï pāraddhaṁ pariharantēhi
daḍhalōhasaṅkalāṇa ya annāṇa ya vivihapāsabandhāṇaṁ
tāṇaṁ ciya ahiyayarō vāyābandhō kulīṇāṇaṁ
kīranti jāiṁ jovvaṇavasēṇa aviyāriūṇa kajjāi
vayapariṇāmē bhariyāiṁ tāiṁ hiyaē khuḍukkanti
pariṇamiyakajjaparibhāvaṇāē buddhīō jā visaṭṭanti
tā jaï paḍhamārambhē havanti tā kiṁ na pajjattaṁ?
paḍhamaṁ ciya rōsavasē jā icchā hōi sā na kāyavvā
aha kahava kīraï cciya na sundarō tīya pariṇāmō
aparikkhiyakayakajjaṁ siddhaṁ pi na sajjaṇā pasaṁsanti
suparikkhiya puṇō vihaḍiyaṁ pi na jaṇēi vayaṇijjaṁ
vayaṇijjaṁ ciya maraṇaṁ hōi kulīṇāṇa sayaṇamajjhammi
jaṁ puṇa maraṇaṁ sā kālapariṇaī lōyasāmannā
kettiyamittaṁ ca dharā maha baliṇō tujjha maggamāṇassa
appā na kēvalaṁ ciya ahaṁ pi lahuīkaō kaṇha!
taïyapayaṁ alahantō sāmarisō kīsa kaṇha! maha uvariṁ
ettha tuha cciya dōsō maḍahā puhaī kayā jēṇa
parapatthaṇāpavannaṁ mā jaṇaṇi! jaṇēsi ērisaṁ puttaṁ
uyarē vi taṁ ma dharihasi patthaṇabhaṅgō kaō jēṇa
jāō si kīsa duggaya!? kiṁ na vilīṇō si gabbhavāsē vi?
mahilāṇa maṇḍaṇaṁ avihavalattaṇaṁ na uṇa purisāṇa
attāṇaṁ ciya duharaṁ jāṇa jaē tēhiṁ kiṁ va jāēhiṁ?

susamatthā jē na parōvayāriṇō tēhi vi na kiñci
ētadanantaram imā gāthā ṭippaṇīrūpēṇa lēkhakalikhitāsti —
tēhi vi na kiñci bhaṇiē vikkamarāēṇa dēva tuṭṭhēṇa
diṇṇa māyagasaya kīḍhī hēmassa jaccassa
uvayārō kīraï khalayaṇassa jō phusaï takkhaṇa ccēva
suaṇō uvayāramahabbharēṇa dukkhaṁ samuvvahaï
dō purisā dharaü dharā, ahavā dōhiṁ pi dhāriyā dharaṇī
uvayārē jassa maī, uvayariyaṁ jō na pamhusaī
jaï maṇḍalēṇa bhasiyaṁ hatthiṁ daṭṭhūṇa haṭṭamajjhammi
tā kiṁ gayassa jujjaï suṇahēṇa samaṁ kaliṁ kāuṁ?
paḍivayaṇasamatthēṇa vi sahiyavvaṁ dujjaṇassa suyaṇēṇa
na ya piṭṭhammi nilīṇō vasahassa siriṁ haraï kāō
ukkhaṇaï ṇaïniyaïṁ? pavaṇō nāūṇa tucchamūlāiṁ
mūlēi mahallatarū garuyā garuyaṁ virōhanti
garuyāṇaṁ garuya cciya uvayāraṁ jaï karanti na hu annō
kō ulhavēi viñjhaṁ mēhēṇa viṇā palippantaṁ?
rūsanti dūhavā sūhavāṇa, dhaṇaïttayāṇa dāliddā
paṇḍiyajaṇāṇa mukkhā, asaīō saīṇa rūsanti
dīsantō amayamaō lōaṇa-maṇanandaṇō imō ekkō
visadalanimmiyadēhō ēsō puṇa dūhavō annō
muharāo cciya bhannaï jō jassa piō kimattha bhaṇiēṇa?
paṅgaṇayaṁ ciya sāhaï gharassa abbhintaraṁ lacchiṁ
jāīsarāiṁ mannē imāiṁ nayaṇāiṁ honti lōyassa
viyasanti piē diṭṭhē, avvō! maülanti vēsammi
aṇurāyanibbharaṁ pi hu pemmaṁ māṇēṇa jāi sayakhaṇḍaṁ
viccippiyajalaṇāliddhaṁ taḍayaḍasaddēṇa lōṇaṁ va
addaṁsaṇēṇa piyayama! suṭṭhu vi nēhāṇurāyarasiyāiṁ
hatthaüḍapāṇiyāiṁ va kālēṇa galanti pemmāiṁ
hiyaē cittuttinnē viyaliyanēhē paṇaṭṭhasabbhāvē
abbhatthaṇāē pemmaṁ kīrantaṁ kērisaṁ hōi?
pasayacchi! parasarīrē jōiyapaïyaṁ?ti niggaē jīē
tuhuṁ puṇa jīvantāṇa vi aviṇaṭṭhataṇuṁ samāruhasi
parapurapavēsavinnāṇalāhavaṁ suhaya! sikkhiō kattha?
jēṇa païṭṭhō hiyaē paḍhamē ciya saṅgamē majjha… …
jaï sā lāyannanihī diṭṭhā nayaṇēhiṁ te cciya rulantu
aṅgāiṁ apāviyasaṅgamāiṁ tā kīsa jhijjanti?
daṭṭhūṇa taruṇisura … … loṭṭantavaddhakaraṇēhiṁ
dīvō vi taggayamaṇō gayaṁ pi tellaṁ na yāṇēi
ēsō vōlēi sahī jō sō hiyayaṁ… …mahilāṇa
diṭṭhēṇa tēṇa kīraï niuṇāvēḍhō niyambassa
sikkāra-kaṇirakurarava-pārāvayasadda-kōilāraviyaṁ
kāṁi vi karinti! hala sahi!, piyasuraē vēyaṇā kattō?
rēhaï ciya lambirakēsahatthakuṇḍalalalantahāralayā
aḍḍhoppaïyā vijjāhari vva purisā''rayē vālā
purisannu bāla ? khellantayassa jaṁ paḍaï vāri ramaṇīyaṁ
guruvirahajalaṇasantāvatāviyaṁ taṁ piyassa ōlhāvaē aṅgaṁ ?
jattha sarē majjijjaï sēvaya?taruṇariṇīhiṁ tāviyaṅgīhiṁ
sālūrā tavanayaṇamayā tattha va dīsanti gayajīvā
avvō! na jāmi khettē, sālī khajjantu kīranivahēhiṁ
jāṇantā vi hayāsā pahiyā pucchanti mē maggaṁ
kaha rakkhēu varāī kalavī kīrāṇa mandagaïgamaṇā
pīṇunnayagaruyapayōharēhiṁ tālā na saṅghaḍaï
pattē piyapāhuṇaē kiṁ kāhī duggaō turantō vi?
andhō maliēhiṁ vi lōyaṇēhiṁ andho cciya varāō
guṇiṇō vihavārūḍhāṇa, vihaviṇō guruguṇāṇa na hu kipi
annōnnayalahuyayarā girīṇa jē mūla-siharēhiṁ
kaṅkellipallavuvvellamaṇaharē jaï vi nandaṇē caraï
karahassa taha vi maruvilasiyāiṁ hiyaē khuḍukkanti
kasiṇojjalō virāyaï vēṇīdaṇḍō niyaṁvabiṁvammi
tuha sundari! surayamahānihāṇarakkhābhuaṅgō vva
kaha tammi nivvavijjaï dukkhaṁ dukkhuddhuēṇa hiyaēṇa
addāē paḍiviṁvaṁ va jammimma dukkhaṁ na saṅkamaï
atthavaṇaṁ paharaparavvasāṇa jaï hōi, hōu, kō dōsō?
jaṁ puṇa muccaï tēō sūrāṇa na ērisaṁ juttaṁ
pacchābhimuhō vaccaï paharahaō aṁvaraṁ vimottūṇa
taha vi hu bhannaï sūrō peccha pasiddhīē māhappaṁ
khaṇḍijjantō vi sasī avamāṇaṁ sahaï punnimā jāva
sūrō payāvaharaṇē atthamaï, na khaṇḍaṇaṁ sahaï
gayaṇaṅgaṇaparisakkaṇakhaṇḍaṇadukkhāiṁ sahasu aṇudiyaha
na suhēṇa hariṇalañchaṇa! kīraï jayapāyaḍō appā
anna cciya sā jāī jīē phalaṁ hōi surahigandhaḍḍhaṁ
ēsā kusume cciya navari sundarō vihaḍaï phalammi
ekkēṇa vi tīrataḍaṭṭhiēṇa haṁsēṇa hōi jā sōhā
sā saravaraṁ na pāvaï vahuēhiṁ vi ḍhikkasatthēhiṁ
jaha haṁsō māṇasasaraviyambhiyaṁ dēi laliyapayamaggaṁ
taha kiṁ baō varāō jāṇaï calaṇaṁ pi ukkhaṇiuṁ?
jaha barahiṇassa chajjaï vihuyakalāvassa mahurakēyaravō
taha vāyasassa kattō diyahaṁ pi vaṇē sarantassa?
uppayaï gayaṇamaggē, bhañjaï kasiṇattaṇaṁ, payāsēi
taha vi hu gobbaraīḍō na pāvaē bhamaracariyāiṁ
avirayarayakēlipasaṅgasokkhasabbhāvaīsikuṇṭhaïyaṁ
māṇanisāṇayanisiyaṁ hōi puṇō ahiṇavaṁ pemmaṁ
nivvattasuraya! jaṁ paramuhattaṇaṁ suhaya! sikkhiō kattha?
aha suṇayāṇa pasaṅgē, aha suṇayā tuha pasaṅgāō
pecchaha pavaravahūṇa suraē calaṇāṇa jērisō maggō
najjaï vambhaṇḍapaḍantayassa okkhambhaṇā dinnā
taṁ kimpi kayaṁ raïsaṅgamammi mihuṇēhiṁ cāḍuparikammaṁ
jaṁ sariūṇa virāmē annōnnaṁ lajjiyā hunti
taha tēhiṁ ekkamekkaṁ avagūḍhaṁ virahadubbalaṅgēhiṁ
jaha tattamayaṇadhīuliya vva ekkaṁ va jāyāiṁ
aṇavarayasalilanivaḍantadhārapaharāhayā visūranti
daḍḍhagaïndā, tuṅgattaṇēṇa nilayaṁ na pāvēnti
jaha māyaṅgā saṅgahasi viñjha! taha ya jaï mayavaī ekkō
jīvantassa na kīraï vasacchēō pulindēhiṁ
sasahara hariṇaṭṭhāṇi jaï sīhasilibu dharantu
tā dukkaru tuha rāhu! jaï māṇummalaṇa karantu
pālittaya! kahasu phuḍaṁ sayalaṁ mahimaṇḍalaṁ bhamantēṇa
diṭṭhō suya vva kattha va candaṇarasasīyalō aggī?
ayasābhiyōgasantāviyassa purisassa suddhasīlassa
hōi vasaṁ tassa phuḍa candaṇarasasīyalō aggī
suyaṇō suddhasahāvō maïlijjantō vi dujjaṇajaṇēṇa
chārēṇa dappaṇō iva ahiyayaraṁ nimmalō hōi
jaṁ uppalassa pattēṇa chijjaē kiṁ tha satthamaggēṇa?
mahurammi bhāṇiyavvē ki tē kaḍuēṇa bhaṇiēṇa?
aṇuyattaha, bhaṇaha piyaṁ, jaṁ kajjaṁ taṁ muṇēha hiyaēṇa
mahuraṁ lavaï mayūrō savisaṁ ca bhuyaṅgamaṁ khāi
jampasusi muṇālasarisaṁ, jaṁ kajjaṁ taṁ muṇēhi hiyaēṇa
mahuraṁ lavaï mayūrō savisaṁ ca bhuyaṅgamaṁ khāi
kajjammi samāvaḍiē aṇuyattaï dujjaṇaṁ pi dussīlaṁ
kīsa na pijjaï nimbō sarīrasaṁrakkhaṇaṭṭhāē?
jēṇa viṇā na dalijjaï aṇuṇijjaï sō kayāvarāhō vi
pattē vi nayaradāhē bhaṇa kassa na vallahō aggī?
sarisē vi maṇuyajammē ḍahaï khalō, sajjaṇō suhāvēi
lōhaṁ ciya sannāhō rakkhaï jīyaṁ, asī haraï
sarisē vi jalaṇadāhē gaṇḍaṁ cuṁvanti kaṇayapattāiṁ
ōruyaï nēuraṁ sāmalīē calaṇōvari vilaggaṁ
garuyāiṁ ciya sāhaï purisō kajjāiṁ, natthi sandēhō
rōsō suraṅgadhūli vva jassa na hu pāyaḍō hōi
sajjaṇasalāhaṇijjē payammi appā na ṭhāviō jēhiṁ
tē puvvapurisamāhappagavviyā kaha na lajjanti?
aṇamisanayaṇāē maē jaṁ pīyaṁ piyayamassa lāyannaṁ
aṅgāiṁ tēṇa piyasahi! ajja ajinnēṇa majjanti
pasayacchi! sō kayatthō jassa kaē mannugaggarijjantā
pañcamasarapasaruggāragabbhiṇā inti nīsāsā
tē dhannā annabhuagamēhi pāraddhasurayakālammi
jē puṇa tuṅgayasupaōharīṇa hiyaē khuḍukkanti
jampantō avihattaviggahō? taṁ suhaya! ajja saccaviyaṁ
danta-nahakkhaya sundara! tuha hiyaē maha khuḍukkanti
uṇhāiṁ nīsasantō avagūhasi kīsa maṁ parāhuttaṁ?
hiyayaṁ palīviuṁ ciya iṇhiṁ piṭṭhiṁ palīvēsi
nijjantō kammaparavvasāhiṁ annannadaṅgataruṇīhiṁ
ēsa hi ōsahiviḍavō aṅgē challī na palhavaï
jō visamammi vi kajjē kajjārambhaṁ na muccaē dhīrō
ahisāriya vva lacchī nivaḍaï vacchatthalē tassa
racchāṇumaggacaḍiō nā''lattō jaṁ jaṇāṇa bhīyāē
sō cēva virahaḍāhō ajja vi hiyaē chamacchamaï
viddhō jiyaï suhēṇaṁ, maraï aviddhō tuha'cchibāṇēhiṁ
kēṇēyaṁ sikkhaviyā aüvvamēyaṁ dhaṇuvvēyaṁ?
daṭṭhō vi dahaï aṅgaṁ nijjīvō saṅkhacuṇṇō vva
tā kiṁ karēmi māē! nijjiyaraṅgassa kāmaēvassa?
sabbhāvavāhirēhi vi taha kahavi piyakkharēhiṁ jampanti
jaha bandhava tti kaliuṁ lōē sīsēṇa vubbhanti
jalahivisaghaḍiēṇa vi nivasijjaï harasirammi candēṇa
jattha gayā tattha gayā guṇiṇō sīsēṇa vubbhanti
ṭhāṇaṁ guṇēhiṁ labbhaï tā guṇagahaṇaṁ avassa kāyavvaṁ
hārō vi guṇavimukkō na pāvaē taruṇithaṇavaṭṭhaṁ
varisanti na mēhā gajjiūṇa, pahuṇō na dinti hasiūṇa
na phalanti tarū jē phulliūṇa tē kaha na lajjanti?
sāhīṇāmaya-rayaṇō amaramarōraṁ ca bhuaṇamakuṇantō
ullasirīhiṁ na lajjasi laharīhiṁ taraṅgiṇīnāha!
paraēsagayāṇummāhiyāṇa jantūṇa sōyataviyāṇaṁ
niyadēsāgayadiṭṭhaṁ suṇayaṁ pi suhāvahaṁ hōi
savvaṅganivvuiyarō sō annō sattamō rasō kōi
āsāijjaï jō paḍhamapemmapiyasaṅgamāhintō
jaṁ satthēsu na suvvaï, agōyaraṁ jaṁ mahākaīṇaṁ pi
taṁ kimpi suhaṁ navasaṅgamammi daïō jaṇō dēi
jō ruccaï sō lōṇiyōyā, vambha! kiṁ nēhi vidhēya?
chaḍḍivi sakkaraguliyarasa, maṭṭī khanti aṇēya
jāhã na atthī gujjhirasu, rūvu mahaddahi jāu
khantaü mahui dāruṇahaṁ, kanta! lahēsahi sāu
virasāiṁ jāi pamuhē, amayarasāyanti jāiṁ pariṇāmē
kajjāiṁ tāiṁ suvicāriyāiṁ na jaṇē hasijjanti
jampasi muṇālasarisaṁ, hiyaē sāraṅgasiṅgakuḍilō si
āpaṇṇaṇasuhayasaralattaṇēṇa paravandaṇijjō si
jammi tumaṁ aïnēhā sō vi tumaṁ mandanēhaō putti!
na hu tālā vajjaï dīhara'cchi! ekkēṇa hatthēṇa
jatthagaō tatthagaō sāmali! sīhō na jujjayai dalammi
sappurisō vi taha cciya, phusi nayaṇā, kiṁ tha runnēṇa?
nāūṇa vi vinnāṇaṁ kāūṇa vi samarasāhasaṁ kammaṁ
laṅghēūṇa vi mēruṁ puṇṇēhi viṇā suhaṁ kattō?
